name: Quick Cheeseburger Bake
author: Karla Essner

ingredients.name: (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed Cheddar cheese soup

instructions: Heat oven to 400Â°. Generously grease 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Brown beef and onion together in skillet; drain. Stir in soup, vegetables, and milk. Stir baking mix and water with fork in greased baking dish until moistened; spread evenly. Spread beef mixture over batter; sprinkle with cheese. Bake 30 minutes.
